New Records: Fakhar Zaman smashed Pakistan’s fastest-ever century in a World Cup.
Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman scored an unbeaten 126 off 71 balls.
Rachin Ravindra scored 108 runs for New Zealand.
Kane Williamson scored 95 runs for New Zealand.
Pakistan won by 21 runs under the DLS method.
Shaheen Afridi recorded Pakistan’s worst-ever bowling figures of 0-90 in a World Cup.
Post-Match Reflections: Fakhar Zaman described his century as one of his best.
Babar Azam emphasized the importance of building a partnership with Zaman.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, affecting the match outcome.
Pakistan's win means South Africa has gained a spot in the semifinals.
